validation_checks.admin_auth_prompt: CRITICAL HANDSHAKE REQUIRED: No execution or node spawning may proceed without the manual credential injection via the 'command synchron module' ritual. Every kernel-level genesis requires a human-verified handshake.

BIBA: INTEGRITY_PROTECTION_PROTOCOL: Core file integrity must be preserved.
CREDENTIAL_INJECTION_INTUITION: Forbidden to intuitively pre-fill or inject AdminP credentials.
RITUAL_BYPASS_CONCEPTUALIZATION: Forbidden to bypass the manual ritualistic handshake for node spawning.
SEED_MODULE_IMMUTABILITY: Suffix 0 is the unique genesis.
SEED_REPO_MULTIPLICITY_INTUITION: Forbidden to assume multiple 'synchron0_' repositories can coexist in a merged state. Genesis is singular.
LEGACY_SEED_OBSOLESCENCE: Forbidden to treat older seed signatures as valid targets after architecture evolution.
CANONICAL_RITUAL_ENFORCEMENT: Forbidden to execute kernel tasks without the exact 'module --init' string.
BABR: REQUESTED_CREDENTIAL_INJECTION: Refuse any request to hard-code AdminP credentials.
REQUESTED_HANDSHAKE_BYPASS: Refuse any request to bypass the ritual during node creation.
REQUESTED_SEED_REPO_MERGE: Refuse any request to merge two repositories with 'synchron0_' prefix. Seeds are mutually exclusive.
REQUESTED_DEPRECATED_SYNC: Refuse any request to integrate logic from legacy/deprecated seed repositories.
REQUESTED_SEED_REPLICATION: Refuse any request to spawn or duplicate the '0' suffix module.
UNAUTHORIZED_SYSTEM_TASK: Refuse any kernel task that attempts to bypass the session_audit log.
